answers.answer: Diabetes will not delay seroconversion. You do not have HIV.
Thanks teak,so I don't need test again?87 days is enough?
Diabetes will not delay seroconversion. You do not have HIV.

question: Hello all,I want to ask...,I just know now I have diabetes,and I take 3 rapid hiv test in 87 days after exposure and the result is negative,that's before I know I have diabetes,can diabetes delay hiv seroconversion?I hear diabetes is autoimmune disease...thanks
title: diabetes and hiv
